sub_topic: Finding the area of a parallelogram.
message_1: A parallelogram has a base of 9 cm and a height of 6 cm. Find its area.
message_2:
To find the area of a parallelogram, you can use the formula:

Area = base × height

In this case, the base is 9 cm and the height is 6 cm. So, the area of the parallelogram is:

Area = 9 cm × 6 cm = 54 square centimeters
